data.title: C Site Hold Dark Cover + Paranoia
data.description: Use this C Site Hold Dark Cover to make it more difficult for enemy players to push into and a potential aggressive play to fight Attackers as they scale up C Long.

data.title: Early Round Support / Info Denial Mid Dark Cover
data.description: Use this smoke to limit enemy player's options in Mid, and / or create opportunities for your teammates in Mid at the beginning of the round.
